website_summaries.verdict: The best budget wall heater for smaller spaces and rooms that need a temperature boost in the winter.
pros: A lot of power output (750 watts or 1500 watts depending on power input) in a small frame
Heating elements are quiet during normal operation

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our master bath redo. We had wall space for it, and we did not want to mess with in-floor heat as we were doing it all ourselves and were concerned about power consumption in our upstairs bath - too far from the electric panel to run more power. So we decided to try this. It will not make the room hot, but it will take the chill off, which is what we were looking for. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DAJ54

customer_reviews.title: Great supplemental heater for MB.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a space-heater for our MB bathroom while showering in the winter months. This is better than a portable unit because it occupies no space. We have a mid-century classic ranch-style home, so we had to convert a linen closet into a master shower because mid century Ranch's only had halfbaths. They're small, but adequate for all our needs after the shower was added except for a space-heater for winter. Our handyman wired & installed this heater in a jiffy, and gave us an additional electric outlet for charging our smartphones, the vacuum cleaner, etc. This heaters great for the price, and looks aesthetic too. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: WJL

customer_reviews.title: emmited sparks and started a fire.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater for a bathroom October 21 2019. I installed it October 30 2019 the heater quit working December 21 2019. the heating element burnt up and emitted sparks onto the bath room floor and caught a bathmat on fire. I am thankful that I was home and in the bathroom when this happen. I think there is a major design flaw with this heater. DO NOT BUY THIS HEATER!!! IT IS DANGERIOUS TO USE. and Broan need to refund money I will gladly send it back to them so they can do an investigation what caused it.
customer_reviews.author: Russ P.

customer_reviews.title: Internal thermostat could be set higher
customer_reviews.text: Used this unit to heat a bathroom without having to heat the entire house. It's not too noisy for a fan-forced heater and is suitable for heating a small room. My complaints: 1) The internal thermostat is set a bit low and, even when turned up all the way, it cuts off the heat before the room is fully warmed up, and 2) After a few months use the fan blades build up a really disgusting coating of dust bunnies, but I guess that's a sign that the unit is moving plenty of air over the heating coils.
customer_reviews.author: MarcR

customer_reviews.title: Requires adjustment but then works well
customer_reviews.text: At first i was a bit frustrated with this because it would shutoff well before getting warm enough. It could maybe heat my bathroom up to 68. The thermostat would not kick the heater on until the dial was turned more than halfway. Taking it apart i found you could adjust the engagement point by bending a metal tab in the thermostat, and I moved the shutoff switch because it would engage far too early. Now it can heat my bathroom to a balmy 75 before shutting off on its highest setting. Install was fairly straightforward otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Mak B.

customer_reviews.title: Great heater !!
customer_reviews.text: We love this heater...we installed it in our 170 sq ft granny unit with high ceiling and it heats it up perfectly.It takes approx half hour to get the temp up to 82 degrees max which is more heat than we need.Its easy to use..we usually start it on high and then lower it to half way setting once it heats up to the temp we want...Its not loud it does a great job keeping us warm...We use the 1500W wiring... It looks great. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Nonita Miller

customer_reviews.title: Used in my camper van, and I LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my camper van and I LOVE it. It is able to keep my van warm even in the cold and windy teens. I love that it is built-in and recessed, so no need to move a portable heater around. I recommend getting the more powerful 1400 watt version if you are going to be in colder weather. If this stopped working, I would immediately and without hesitation buy another one. I also appreciate the thermostat; I read some complaints about it,but that must be fixed in the new versions because it keeps my van at the set temperature. LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: kmrotterdam

customer_reviews.title: Broan 174 750/1500W 120 VAC Painted Grill Wall Heater
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a bathroom rehab. It can run on 120 or 220. We already had a 220 feed in the room that powered a 40 year old baseboard heater so we didn't have to run a fresh power feed. After looking at in-floor radiant heating systems and choking on the price for even a small bathroom, we decided this one would do the trick for the month or so in the dead of winter when I didn't want to deal with shrinkage after stepping out of the shower. Installed easily, works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Scratch

customer_reviews.title: works (sometimes)
customer_reviews.text: I am on my THIRD thermostat (graciously provided by Broan free of charge). I have two of these installed in the bathrooms of my cabin. Loud, but you better not complain about that... The thermostats keep cutting out before room gets up to temp; one of these units works perfectly, the other, not so much. Third time's the charm, right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off too soon.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement of the same model that I had been using for almost 10 years, but I guess there's been a modification. The case gets hot and causes the heater to shut off too soon. Didn't have to make any modifications on the installation, because it's the same exact fit. The manufacturer needs to fix
customer_reviews.author: IN LA

customer_reviews.title: USELESS. WORTHLESS. DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: DO NO PURCHASE I PURCHASED 2 AND THEY DO NOT TURN ON. TOOK THEM TO AN ELECTRICAL ENGENDER AND IS IMPOSSIBLE TO GET THEM TO WORK. A REAL SHAME AMAZON IS ALLOWING STUFF LIKE THIS TO SOLD TO CONSUMERS.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good little heater but doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a bathroom in a barn. I put it in when I remodeled it in 2011. I had to replace it in 2016 when it crapped out. Now that one has died so they only last a few years. And since they are built in you are stuck with buying another. Seems like it should last longer
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. Granger

customer_reviews.title: Great Company Support
customer_reviews.text: We are not good DIY'ers but this heater was easy to install. When we had questions about 110 or 120 installation we called the company and got the answer right away. This little heater is POWERFUL, it heats up the 14X14 foot kitchen/utility room in a matter of minutes. And we figure it will pay for itself quickly as it replaced an outdated, energy hog baseboard heater. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Perri A. McGee

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: If you have no obstacles I think the install will go easy. I had to cut a section of the 2x4 to install, the wiring was very easy only because I had a nearby outlet. The unit itself was installed in a small bathroom and works great. If you turn it on and close the door within minutes it's nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: I love this heater
customer_reviews.text: I love this heater. My husband installed this in our bathroom and it is so handy. We mainly use a wood stove for heat and it is usually cold in our house in the mornings. I love being able to go in the bathroom and turn this on to heat the room up quickly. It is also nice to use when my son is in the bath, I can keep the room very warm while still having the door open. It was fairly easy for my husband to install but did require some electrical knowledge. I plan to purchase another one of these to install in my bedroom for chilly nights!
customer_reviews.author: LittleRochi

customer_reviews.title: Heater failed after just a few days in service. Blows only cold air now.
customer_reviews.text: Had wall heater installed by electrician. Was set to keep my well-insulated storage shed above freezing. Worked well for about 2 weeks, but today the heating element stopped heating. Thermostat turns fan on and it just keeps running because no heat is produced by the element. No sign of overheating, pushed reset button, fan works as before, but no heat at all. Now I have to call electrician out again to check it out. VERY expensive to have a second service call for one simple heater installation. Disappointing lack of quality from a company I have trusted for heaters all my life.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Butcher

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Could not find a good combination exhaust fan and heater, wall mount, so I bought this heater and installed a separate fan and love the whole idea. I wired a wall switch for the heater and mounted it down low to the floor. That way I can flip a switch with a preset temperature and heat nothing but cold air on the floor. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Easy to replace
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 21 year old same model Broan heater in one of our bathrooms. We were always happy with the original one and the really cool part was it took me 10 minutes to replace it. Took the knob and grill off, unplugged the harness and removed 1 screw to remove the unit. Installing the new unit into the existing box was easy because everything was the same between the new one and the old one. Twenty one years of service and a great price: it's hard to argue with that.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Heater works fine, installation went very well
customer_reviews.text: Heater works fine, installation went very well, only problem I have; wrong knob I do believe. Had problem getting it onto thermostat shaft that is sticking out too far for the knob to seat properly and then found that the knob has guide pins that do not fit the openings for them. Sorry for the delay with this review; if this problem gets resolved I will certainly give a better score.
customer_reviews.author: andony

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Unit works ok, 3 stars as the set point of 68 degrees is barely off the lower stop, mounting brackets were hidden in the packaging. Pulls air in the main part of the grill and only discharges through a small area at the side of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Bush II

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUSLY DEFECTIVE. PLEASE READ
customer_reviews.text: This $70 wall heater burned out after less than 2 months use. It threw sparks onto the floor before dieing. It was installed professionally. This terrible item could have easily started a FIRE had I not luckily been present to disconnect power while it was failing. I am sickened by the thought that this could so easily have burned my home to the ground, harmed or killed my family, and ruined our lives. DO NOT BUY THIS DEFECTIVE HEATER.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!! Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time and money. Thermostat doesn’t work right, turned all the way up it only stays on for 5 mins. Blows heat straight down. What a piece of junk!!!
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: They have made the winter nights much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One to place in my windowless bathroom where the baseboard did not circulate heat and one in my unheated house extension where I have my laundry. The bathroom unit is connected to my digital thermostat and works very well. It circulates heat all over the bathroom and it is more quiet than expected. The other is manually operated and works well as needed. They have made the winter nights much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JJS

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the toilet room and used the instructed method to cut the power in half. Even at half capacity this thing gives off plenty of heat. I was an electrician for several years and pulled power for this out of the light switch. Now, not all switches will accommodate this but mine has no problem but I calculated the potential amperage.
customer_reviews.author: utemachine

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THiS
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and it broke almost instantly. So I returned it. Figured i had installed it wrong. Got another and it caught on fire. DONT BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: John Barone

customer_reviews.title: If anyone has that information I would love to know
customer_reviews.text: So far it look ok. The color is a bit of a putty color and I wish it were more white. Perhaps it can be painted with Krylon spray for plastic? If anyone has that information I would love to know. This is part of a bath renovation for a client and it has not been used yet as it is summer.
customer_reviews.author: mte

customer_reviews.title: Impressive little wall heater
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this little heater. The install was fairly straight forward, but the instruction to convert the wiring to 240V was a little confusing at first. I installed this in a 225 sq ft basement room with 7' ceilings and it heats up the room without a problem. Only time will tell how it holds up. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good unit..easy to install..other reviews were accurate...thermostat does shut unit off too early...need separate thermostat, or in our case we put Insulation around the thermostat...it helped
customer_reviews.author: Kiethington123

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hardwired/built in heater
customer_reviews.text: Great heater, simple and flexible. Very easy to switch from 120volt to 220volt or to change wattage. Includes simple to follow instructions with pictures to walk you through all steps of the mounting and wiring process. Puts out a lot of heat with good air movement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a MONTH !
customer_reviews.text: Once installed, the heater warmed the small bathroom well. However, we noticed yesterday a bright light coming from the heater. It has been determined the heating element has burned up. So sad because now we need to see if there's a replacement part............ Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Crittenden

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater!! Order it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome heater, had a bad switch out of the box but amazon replaced it right away. Great heater great service. Make sure you have a dedicated 20amp service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We returned this
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our laundry room. Waste of money. returned it. It did not work. Rarely turned on. I think the thermostat was broken.
customer_reviews.author: knittedpiecrust

customer_reviews.title: 3 Purchases, 3 fails
customer_reviews.text: This product repeatedly failed. I originally bought 2. When one stopped working, I bought another one, then the both remaining failed. Life expectancy of this product is about 3 weeks, then the core stops heating and then blows recirculated air.
customer_reviews.author: mauro Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This heater would only run on HI setting for about 1 minute and then it would turn off without heating the small area that needed to be heated. Tried troubleshooting to no avail. I should have paid attention to the reveiws before I purchased. Its too late for a return at this point. I will NEVER buy a Broan product again EVER!! I would have given it a negative rating if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: Allen123

customer_reviews.title: Great heaters
customer_reviews.text: I have several houses (rentals) and I have this heater in several. They can be wired in 110v or 220v. I would give them 5 stars but they seem to die a bit more frequently than I would like. Of course if someone vacuumed them out to keep hair, dust etc from building up they would probably last longer. Tenants don't care so that does not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Delia M. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Heats room appropriately sized
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great on small 120 sq.ft. shed. Ensure proper installation and electrical connections. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: I have sent several email to return merchandise but never ...
customer_reviews.text: I have sent several email to return merchandise but never got a response. Never used product it did not fit the purpose for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: This item put out alot of heat but it just did not fit the wall area I had
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  operation
customer_reviews.text: Good product, easy to install , quiet operation , neat finished look.
customer_reviews.author: Roxann S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend functions as described
customer_reviews.text: As described functional wall heater for the bottom of our stairs I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and put it in our bathroom and it does a great job in heating it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement
customer_reviews.text: This model was a replacement for a bathroom heater and was able to install in the existing housing. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: I needed this in a hurry. It came in 2 days. Installs very easy, if just basic replacement. Heats bottom of my stairs great! Great heat output.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Heater
customer_reviews.text: Installed in the bathroom master bath works very well keep the bathroom fairly warm large bathroom
customer_reviews.author: alan merklein

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Free Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Kept my latrine, in the shop that has no heat, from freezing all winter
customer_reviews.author: Cattleman Dennis

customer_reviews.title: How it works after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, good looking. I like the flush mount. We just installed it so we don't really have any idea of how it's going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat was broken as it would come on for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat was broken as it would come on for a few seconds then stop. Didn't even heat up enough to shut off, so we called Broan and they are sending a new thermostat in the mail. Hopefully it'll work after we put in the new one. Otherwise, I will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy install & has heated very well!
customer_reviews.author: katagaria1

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Its noisy & sparks when it shots off. It scares me.
customer_reviews.author: Mila Parsley

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves this heater in her bath
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that I could wire this for either 750 watts OR 1500 watts
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Approximately 5 years later and still working like a charm. Perfect for our bathroom. Installed it on one side of the vanity, looks ok and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank White

customer_reviews.title: Love it! This little heater in a small bathroom ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This little heater in a small bathroom warms the entire hallway as well on the low setting. It is a little noisy and we had measured the size of space and it matched the heater description BUT the heater was smaller that indicated so we now have a bigger hole than is necessary. (We took out a very old gas heater and put this in the same spot.)
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Magee

customer_reviews.title: Broan Wall Heater
customer_reviews.text: The heater is easy to install and is nice and quiet and blows hot enough, but it cuts out too soon before the room is warmed up. The face plate gets very hot and I think that effects the thermostat, so it shuts off. The small portable heater that we previously used would heat up the room to a higher level.. But, it does function to a smaller degree.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money for a better unit didn't last 2 winters. Mid Missouri. Open box one I purchased didnt last 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: We installed into the wall in a basement bedroom. The unit is rather noisy but wouldn't be an issue if it didn't kick off every 30 secs or so an will not warm the room up. Reading other reviews it looks like it's a thermostat issue? Don't know if I can replace the thermostat or not..
customer_reviews.author: cd1

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Turned a 10' x 20' shed into a cabin. Once insulated and sheeted, this heater keeps it comfortable all day and night
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: A great little heater for a bathroom or small room. Thermostat works great as well. Requires 220 volts so make sure you can provide that before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Sims

customer_reviews.title: Heats small space rapidly
customer_reviews.text: Works well to heat a small space. Does need to be hardwired
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to convert to 220. Easy to install. It is VERY quiet. I think the manufacturer should design a small LED indicator to show it's actually running it's that quiet.
customer_reviews.author: JRM116

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome and quick replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had a 20 year old version of this same heater in a bathroom that needed replacing. The metal casing that installs into the walls is still exactly the same so I didn't even have to swap that piece out. Very awesome and quick replacement.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Easy, and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for the old heater in my shop that finally quit working. Easy installation, and easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Garoutte

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome--buying it again to see if it works just as good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a little camper 3 years ago--heated just GREAT--now I am buying this for our porch we enclosed this past week! I know it will work!!
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: These are nice heaters
customer_reviews.text: These are nice heaters for a small room, easy hookup. I don't know how well they will perform if this is the only heater in u're room. If the room is small i am sure u'll be fine, like a small restroom or bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Shuja M

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: installed easy, instructions were easy to follow. Needs to be hard wired
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install, works as expected. Bought for the bathroom, heats it up in a jiffy, very quiet. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Small and simple with plenty of heating power!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater for my dog house. We use an 8x8 building that has been wired and insulated for our dogs. This little heater works great! Very easy to install and use. Keeps the pups toasty on cold winter nights.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Powell

customer_reviews.title: Wall Heater, Broan 174
customer_reviews.text: Received as advertised, good quality, and promptly shipped. Product was easy to install and matched the decor in our basement powder room perfectly. It supplies just the right amount of heat and is controllable by means of a dial thermostat. I just wish I could get my kids to remember to turn it off when not in use. Having said that, I plan on putting it on a timer just as a precaution.
customer_reviews.author: oldgoat

customer_reviews.title: my boyfriend had no problem installing this, however, ...
customer_reviews.text: my boyfriend had no problem installing this, however, we think we got the wrong knob, as it sticks out really far from the unit and looks a bit goofy. he may end up filing the post down so that the feet on the knob lay flush against the unit.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethC

customer_reviews.title: Replacment for same model
customer_reviews.text: Fits an existing heater that's the same model. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy Broan continues to make this model
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 20 year old Broan with the exact same model. Very happy Broan continues to make this model. Gets very hot when in the 1500 watt configuration!
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Great price!  Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great and was easy to install. We used it on a 5 x 5 fire riser room for freeze protection.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Williams

customer_reviews.title: Price right and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it ,and it was used in a small bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Becky partida

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement worked well
customer_reviews.text: First heater had defective fan motor. Replacement unit worked well and installed easily
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Faulty heating element
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this heater seemed to be good until....The heating element failed after just 3 months of use. It remains to be seen if Broan will take care of this via their warranty coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Kuehn

customer_reviews.title: will not heat a small bathroom is what Broan says.  I have purchased this same unit brfor and it worked in a small room
customer_reviews.text: It will not work in the small bathroom we have and the manufacture says it will not work in a small bathroom. I feel that I have been ripped off by the Broan company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Took about 2 hours to wire in and install with a digital timer switch... left the wiring in 120V 1500 watt, and it produces a great amount of heat for the bathroom. Just installed today so can't say how long it will last, but, at $70 or so, you can replace just the inards pretty easily, no need to replace the frame and electrical...
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t mind staying cold this works great!
customer_reviews.text: Put the thermostat on high and it barely warms up a very small bathroom. The only way to warm up the bathroom with this heater is to bypass the thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: TjOakes

customer_reviews.title: Heaters work great by our open shower
customer_reviews.text: Heaters work great by our open shower, gives just enough heat to take the chill off. They were very easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pk Carver

customer_reviews.title: great replacement heater
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement built in heater in our 2 bedroom condo. This heater has multiple wiring options to allow for 220v or 110v. Since our heaters were wired for 220 I was able to follow the directions in the box and have this heater up and running in about half an hour. The old heater was always setting off the smoke alarm this one has been fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gudly

customer_reviews.title: Broke.
customer_reviews.text: Less than 90 days old and stopped working. I installed it in my bathromm and run it about 20 minutes per day.
customer_reviews.author: abi oliveras

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat knob needs redesign!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and ease of installation. I don’t like the thermostat knob, terrible design looks bad.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Missing knobs- twice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little heater. Have bought 2 of them...and both didn't have the knobs. Don't bother calling support, they want you to jump through a bunch of hoops for a $10 part.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It was a replacement for our Broan that stopped working. Fits and works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: brightshoe

customer_reviews.title: NG
customer_reviews.text: Wish I read the reviews before I bought it. Keeps shutting off. It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: mike r.

customer_reviews.title: It works as described
customer_reviews.text: After 12 years, I needed to replace the original broan wall heater. It works as described. Not the quietest (but none really are). It works just fine. Easy install since it was merely a replacement. I gave it 5 stars because it does what it is supposed to and my original lasted 12 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only needed one.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a month now. Working great. Originally bought 2 and used only one cuz the room stayed nice and warm with one.
customer_reviews.author: Rennie Pelkie

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Big problem is that thermostat is set too low. Turns off before the room is really very warm. There is no way to change the shut off temp other than to lower it.
customer_reviews.author: GAnderson

customer_reviews.title: Replaced and Failed Again
customer_reviews.text: The first one failed after a year. The replacement also failed in about a year with minimal use. Terrible heater.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Crowther

customer_reviews.title: Wall heater
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! I had to convert it to 240 volts for my set up but it heats up in a hurry and it works very little to keep the room warm . All the supplied parts were great and it all went in without any problems . Highly recommended for the price . LHB
customer_reviews.author: Louis B.

customer_reviews.title: bad thermostat
customer_reviews.text: thermostat is very inconsistant. I set the stat one day and it was keeping temp around 35 degrees and the next day it was 45 degrees and never adjusted the thermostat. otherwise it is a good heater. I recommend putting in a auxilary thermostat to control it.
customer_reviews.author: fireman

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement works perfectly. Color is good and blends with off White wall color.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the same (different name) bought 15 years ago that went off, that one was twice more $$$
customer_reviews.author: Cez

customer_reviews.title: Good little heater.
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced an existing one that we thought was bad. It is used in the bath room and supplies more than enough heat. It is so quiet that I sometime forget to turn it off. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandfather

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater. I didn't like the installation instructions and the way the heater box butts up against the drywall though.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: but the final result looks and works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace some ancient wall heaters from the 1970s. Couldn't get the exact size, so installer needed to modify the wall space, but the final result looks and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: SDW

customer_reviews.title: We had to return it did not work
customer_reviews.text: disliked we tried multiple times but just couldn't get it to work
customer_reviews.author: Scott Markley

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to install. Nice and quiet compared to others I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for a little bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a little bathroom. It only requires 120V, so it is easily wired. It is loud, but this isn't a problem for the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Angela O'Shea

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom wall heater
customer_reviews.text: Had been looking for a bathroom heater NO sells them. It works great, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: It turns itself on and off so much that it never really warms up the bathroom. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: T J

product_meta.title: Broan-NuTone 174, White Painted Grille Wall Heater, 750/1500 Watt 120 VAC
product_meta.description:
Style:750/1500WUpgrade your home with Broan-NuTone's Wall Heater! This wall heater is perfect for bathrooms, entryways, or other small areas where a little extra warmth is needed. It is designed with a white grille that has downflow louvers to direct heat gently toward the floor and a one-piece design with a baked enamel finish for durability. It includes an adjustable, front-mounted thermostat to offer a simple and easy way to control the level of heat, a permanently lubricated motor, high efficiency blower wheel, and a manual reset thermal overload protector to ensure reliable, lasting use. This heater has a rapid warm up time due to an efficient nickel-chrome Alloy heating element that provides comforting heat in seconds. It's factory wired for 1500W at 120V AC—easily converts to 750W at 120V AC or 1500W at 240V AC. The heater may be recessed or surface-mounted, depending on your application, to make installation easy! This heater is meant to serve as a heat supplement and not serve as your central heat source. Cozy up in your home with Broan-NuTone's Wall Heater, measuring 9.25" x 12".

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Perfect for bathrooms or other areas where you want added warmth on demand. These versatile heaters are factory wired at 500-Watt, 750-Watt, 1000-Watt, 1500-Watt or 2000-Watt, and can be easily converted to alternate-wattage. Also, each model features-Wattage/voltage options. With such tremendous installation flexibility, you can count on getting a Broan Comfort-Flo Heater that’s precisely what you need for your particular application and room size.
feature_bullets: WALL HEATER: Wall heater provides an energy-saving heating supplement to your home while operating at 1500W and 120VAC but can easily convert to 750W at 120V AC or 1500W at 240V AC
FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: White grille has downflow louvers to direct heat gently toward the floor and a one-piece design with baked enamel finish for durability
EASY TO USE: Includes an adjustable, front-mounted thermostat that offers a simple way to control the level of heat

TRUSTWORTHY: Includes a permanently lubricated motor, high efficiency blower wheel, manual reset thermal overload protector, nickel-chrome heating element, and UL listing to ensure reliable, safe operation every use
SIMPLE INSTALLATION: Heater may be recessed or surface-mounted, depending on your application, for a quick and easy installation
